MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Moss Side Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and due to difficult ground conditions when excavating and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:08pm on 25th of January 2021.
